thread.title: Beyonce Dropped Out Of Coachella, Because Duh
thread.title_full: Beyonce Dropped Out Of Coachella, Because Duh

author: Alanna Bennett Buzzfeed News Reporter
title: Beyonce Dropped Out Of Coachella, Because Duh
text:
Beyonce / Via instagram.com ID: 10586506 4. Tragically, this means we’ll be missing another trademark Bey performance in our lives. We all must mourn this loss together. 
I guess we won't see Bey doing this at Coachella — ilana kaplan (@lanikaps) 
Lol @ me spending thousands of dollars to go to Coachella this year and her cancelling 🙃🙃🙃 — gabifresh (@gabifresh) ID: 10586454 
Beyoncé cancelled her Coachella performance so I'm writing that off as a loss on my taxes — Robin Thede (@robinthede) 
Beyoncé isn't performing at Coachella?! How do I go about getting a refund?! — Brennen Taylor (@BrennenTaylor) 
So many Coachella tickets about to go on sale today since Beyoncé backed out 😂🙏🏻 — Chessa Celaya (@ChessaCelaya) ID: 10586642 
Was low key hoping Bey would drop out of Coachella since I didn't get a ticket in time #selfish — V. (@Shovonnnneee) ID: 10586773 10. But there is still a light at the end of this tunnel: In that aforementioned statement, they promised us Beyonce as a headliner come 2018’s Coachella.
